9.29.17  10:05 pm   Why do you think certain contractions never get used by themselves? For example, you might say "I'm hungry". But if somebody asks "Hey, are you hungry?" You'd never respond by just saying "I'm" (you'd say 'I am' or 'yes' or 'no' or maybe 'I'm not'). Or you might say "I'd like to go to the movies." But if somebody asks if you want to go to the movies, you wouldn't just say "I'd".

9.29.17  8:49 pm   Any particular reason(s) why you like incorporating the text of the lyrics into your videos? Don't get me wrong, I like how you do that. I think it gives the words some extra "oomph" and character (like making certain words with big and bold letters, others small, or cursive, etc), you can also accentuate certain lines (like 'welcome' or 'fun there' or 'pregnant' or 'aliens' etc). Maybe I just answered my own question?
